net.sourceforge.taglets.simple
Interface BlockTaglet

All Superinterfaces:
SimpleTaglet
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConstantsBlockTaglet, DefinitionListBlockTaglet, IgnoreBlockTaglet, ParamBlockTaglet, RegexBlockTaglet, SimpleRegexBlockTaglet, SinceBlockTaglet, TextFilterBlockTaglet
public interface BlockTaglet
extends SimpleTaglet

Interface for "simple" block taglets.

An inline taglet describes output conversion of a block tag like @test that are usually placed at the end of a type description or method.

Version:
1.6 (2008/03/30 12:43:13)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.3.0

Method Detail

getOutput

String getOutput(Logger logger,
                 Parameter parameter,
                 String[] texts)
Returns the output for the specified input texts.

The input texts are fully resolved, i.e. if they contain further inline tags they are first resolved before being passed to this method.

For each block tag that appears in the documentation a separate input text is created. Once all input texts for a given section of the documentation have been collected they are passed in to this method.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for emiting messages.
parameter - the parameter for the tag currently processed.
texts - the fully resolved tag texts.
Returns:
the output text to use in the documentation.
Since:
1.3.0
